page.title: 12TRANSPORT
page.content: The motorway is a major factor in the location of factories.The trading estate is in an exellent position for easy access from the A1M.The motorway also provides roads for Darlington and at the top of Bowburn there is a road intersection with the A177.For the trains there is the main railway line that goes under the A177 at Moor Ho.The Hett line meets the main line south-west of Hoggers gate and goes past Tursdale wood.The main busses that pass Bowburn are the T.M.S (Trimdon Motor Service) and the United,only touring and private busses use the motorway the local busses run from Durham to Coxhoe.The main railway line follows Tursdale Beck to Sunderland Bridge.The motorway intersection is south of Bowburn.The A177 goes past the post office and leads into Durham.
